CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 10, 1961, page A11, reads: "Alpha Wives' Models - The above group of attractive young women, were featured in delightful fashion show at the Alpha Wives swank bridge luncheon last Saturday afternoon at the Hilton Hotel. Left to right: pretty models, Alberta Thompson, Harriet Monroe, an Alpha Wife; Betty Moncrief, whose hats were modeled in the show; Phyllis Stewart, Muriel [Murrel] Wynn Jones, Martha Lucke and Marlene Thomas. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of models, from left: Alberta Thompson, Harriet Monroe, Betty Moncrief, Phyllis Stewart, Murrel Wynn Jones, Martha Lucke, and Marlene Thomas, standing on stairs of stage in Hilton Hotel for Alpha Wives luncheon, vertical version
